text: Is it possible to just output the first 100 characters of a hubl variable. I need to output just the first 20 characters of the content.name variable and the first 100 characters of the content.post-body variable. Thank you so much for your help and have nice evening

How can I get the span wrapper off `{{ content.post_body }}` ? I'm able to remove most of the span wrappers on items using `no_wrapper=True` -- This is to make the html valid, and the nesting content, h1, etc inside a span is bad
